attributes.action: Organisations/companies to have a bereavement and power of attorney department.
attributes.additional_details: Closing/changing accounts after the death of a relative/looking after the affairs of someone without mental capacity is emotionally challenging and stressful. It is harder when companies confuse technology with service. Companies should have a specialist, trained department providing a sensitive service to customers and a free phone number to be shown prominently on websites and paper correspondence. Customers should expect their call to answered quickly and efficiently by a person.
attributes.background: Legislate that organisations/companies have a bereavement and power of attorney department staffed by specialist employees and provide a free call number easily visible on websites and paper correspondence.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual companies.
